name: Mr. Weak
description:
"Mr. Weak... How do you define yourself ?

- I think I am effective in my job

In your job, are you having troubles sometimes ?

- No, I finish the job every time.

What do you know about your employers  ?

- I never see my employers.

Do you like your job

- I never ask myself the question.

How do you feel your future missions ?

- I feel pretty confident, I never failed any missions.

Right... I think we are done for today.
The Guild thanks you for your time..."

Mr. Weak is a fast FPS (First Person Shooter), highly inspired by John Wick made with unity, by one dev.
It has an unique story and a lore, also many characters with their own intentions. 
Every chapters take place in differents neighborhood of the city (I don't have a name for it now).

This demo has the first Chapter ONLY ! The full game will be available on Steam.
